remarks: (AV:  TODO-NM - can this definition (and related theorems) be removed?) Define the class of all topological spaces, each of which is an ordered pair the second of which is a topology on the first.  See ~ istps5OLD for a standard way to express a topological space.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Mar-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
df-topspOLD $p |- TopSpOLD = { <. x , y >. | ( y e. Top /\ x = U. y ) } $.
$d x y $.
